articles.title: Haberman confirms Trump habit that was bad for plumbing and his presidency  - CNN Video
articles.description: The New York Times' Maggie Haberman joins CNN's New Day to reveal images backing up her reporting on former President Donald Trump's habit of flushing key White House documents down the toilet.

articles.title: Analysis: The extraordinary political storm unleashed by the FBI search of Trump's Florida resort

articles.author: Kaitlan Collins, CNN
articles.title: FBI executes search warrant at Mar-a-Lago, Trump says
articles.description: The FBI executed a search warrant on Monday at Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach, Florida, the former President confirms to CNN.
articles.content:
(CNN)The FBI executed a search warrant on Monday at Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach, Florida, the former President confirms to CNN.
This story is breaking and will be updated.
